website_summaries.verdict: Customers wanting a softer mesh net will find their match in this inexpensive product.
pros: Multi-function pockets on the bag allow you to store belongings throughout the week or pet's toys when using as a barrier
Fits well in compact cars, but can also fit some larger vehicles depending on console design
cons: Some customers had issues with the product ripping after a few weeks

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BIG SUV’s
customer_reviews.text: As you can see it’s not suitable for Escalade. My bag fell right through and it barely covers the space stretched to its full extent ..
customer_reviews.author: mei3kids

customer_reviews.title: Measure your car first
customer_reviews.text: My rating for this is based on the quality of the product and the service from the provider. It is well-made and is a great idea. I will encourage you to measure your car before ordering if you want to use it between the front seats. I discovered that the gap between the seats on a full-sized truck was a bit too big for the straps, but I am using it as a seat-back pocket on one seat, and that is working really well. Again, it is well-made and is a really convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Reid W. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: This product does not fit my Rav 4 ,2017. The space is to large. No instruction on how to hook up bottom straps to prevent items from falling through. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: ladyef

customer_reviews.title: Feels pretty sturdy, and doesn't flop around when I drive
customer_reviews.text: Always looking for a way to get more space out of my Audi TT. The amount of usable space in this car is ridiculously low, and this definitely helps. Feels pretty sturdy, and doesn't flop around when I drive. Also matches my door pockets pretty well, making it look like it was a factory accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Benji X

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, something to use as my handbag holder and I have installed it forward facing. I mostly use small handbags so it should fit right into it, for bigger ones I think I will use it as a hammock. The installation was easy and the product feels sturdy. I haven't used it much and will change my rating if I encounter any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than appear in picture, not meant for anything larger than a Barbie car
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my mother-in-law so she could organize her stuff in the used van she bought. Not only is it considerably smaller, there were no directions for how to install it. It may seem self explanatory but it's really too small to stretch to attach to the places it should. The one I ordered looked at least twice this size, and I looked at all the different brands available and this one appeared the largest to me. I've very dissatisfied with my final product and plan to seek a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Jarrell

customer_reviews.title: Works OK if Seats Are Even and Across from Each Other
customer_reviews.text: This works ok if your bucket seats are at the same level. I am short so my seat is pulled forward. My husband's seat is quite a bit further back. It make the organizer have a gap at the bottom and my purse keeps falling through to the floor. It is better for a small purse that you can put inside the pocket. The quality is good. For me it doesn't work that well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for Larger Cars or SUV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep dogs in back seat. However, it is much too small to cover standard space between front seats on my Honda CRV. Very short. Dogs simply crawl under it! Would likely work in small car.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Speight

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra storage!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our relocation from the east coast to west coast due to military orders. Liked the extra storage that others didnt provide. We are day 4 into our journey and it has broken away from the elastics. It has done an amazing job keeping our puppers in the back seat, which they love to try and visit us. Just super bummed it will last only one trip.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Your purse still slides through
customer_reviews.text: Installed the product but it I am carrying a small purse, it slides right under it to the back seat. Made for only large purses. Should fit all purses, that is why I gave it a 1 star. Also the strap under the middle seat console is hard to close the console. Would not buy again. this might be heading to my next garage sale!
customer_reviews.author: 2boxerlover

customer_reviews.title: Can not use In Highlander slide open console
customer_reviews.text: If you own a highlander with slide open console, pass on this item! This item anchors to a flip open console lid! Did not work!
customer_reviews.author: Old Dog New Tricks

customer_reviews.title: A must have for ride share drivers.
customer_reviews.text: This three layer mesh net was exactly what I was looking for. I'm a Uber driver and I can keep items in there for my passengers, such as wet wipes, phone charger cable, barf bags and so much more. If you are in the ride share this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Too short for Honda CRV.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it and seemed well made. It would of been perfect, but it was too short and would not of stopped my purse or anything else from falling into back seat.
customer_reviews.author: squantumite

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install, appears to be good quality but the fact that there’s no vertical divider is a bit of a problem for me. I bought this to hold my travel coffee mug and umbrella. They fall to the side making it hard to reach when driving. Not a big deal for the umbrella as I don’t need that while driving but the main purpose was so I could easily reach my coffee mug. When it falls on its side I can’t reach it. I’ll look for one with vertical dividers. Nothing wrong with the quality and it was easy to install, it just doesn’t suit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: It's not stretchable
customer_reviews.text: Great idea three pockets, just don't stretch in to place lose at the bottom with a tie string. If it expanded like a web, have one like that just no pocteks be great. Otherwise ur stuff shifts, moves
customer_reviews.author: Googleuser

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a road trip from LA to the Bay Area. I got it for my kids to use in the backseat so I didn’t have to reach behind me to give them their snacks. I have had it now for a month and have used it A LOT! It works really well! I haven’t even bothered to take it out of my car. I just leave it set up. My kids really like it too. They can sneak all the snacks they want and I can’t tell how many fruits snacks they’ve had. HAHA. All in all, really glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Noel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR HOLDING YOUR PURSE BETWEEN THE SEATS OUT OF THE WAY
customer_reviews.text: I was given one of these as a gift from a friend. I loved it and when I got a new car recently and gave my old car to my son he wanted to keep it in that car, So I was in need of a new one. This one is much sturdier than the original one I had. It is so nice to have your purse right by your side close at hand without scrambling all over the front seat or the floor to retrieve it. The instructions for this one says it is also good for keeping pets from jumping from the back seat into the front. Installs in minutes. No tools,. Great invention.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bramell

customer_reviews.title: Works great for airplane travel
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use this for my car. It’s in my airplane carrying bag. I use it under the seat back tray to hold my stuff. 1. It holds more stuff better than the thin seat back pockets. 2. If I only put my stuff in this during the flight then I don’t have to worry about forgetting something in the seat back pockets! The carabiners don’t reach all the way around the seat back tray to clip on to each other, but they do clip on to the bottom rail of the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: 3 layer vs 3 pocket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a road trip. It worked well keeping our most used items/snacks handy and accessible. Did not work well keeping my dog in the back seat, since she just worked her head and shoulder over, under or around despite her seat belt. When I read, "3 layer" in the description I thought, "3 pocket", so I was a little disappointed and confused when I received the item and it had only 2 pockets. After rereading I realized my mistake, but found the description misleading. Why not state perfectly clearly that it has 2 pockets. As I write this the pouch has been installed for about 6 weeks. Still holding up just fine and loaded with my crap!!
customer_reviews.author: baduffy

customer_reviews.title: Only if you have a small car
customer_reviews.text: Really? Just what car did you put this in? If you have a very small car with a more narrow space between the seats, this will work; if not, don’t waste your money. In my Kia Sorento, there were big gaps at the side and huge space at the bottom. Not happy because the photo and verbiage were very misleading. My window of return is closed because I waited to long to install. My husband’s healthcare came first. That’s life.
customer_reviews.author: kbslc

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but didn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: I drive a Subaru Ascent and needed it between the driver and front passenger seat. It attaches to the headrest post and for it to fit well both seats need to be in the same position. I drive with my seat raised but the passenger seat doesn’t have that option so it was crooked. If you drive with your seat forward you probably wouldn’t be able to open the center console. It feels sturdy and well made. It is short, the upper straps are adjustable but still not long. So if the area you are trying to cover is long it might not work. The bottom elastic straps are long and stretchy so they would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: TVH

customer_reviews.title: Great For Rideshare
customer_reviews.text: I'm an Uber/Lyft driver, this is a must have if you don't have a lot of space or want to keep things accessible without placing items in cup holders or the floor. Easy to install, looks great :) -The photo doesn't have all the items inside of it, it was when I first got it. Has lots of storage space though. -My car: 2019 Hyundai Sonata Limited Edition 2.0T
customer_reviews.author: Jarminx

customer_reviews.title: Fits VW Tiguan
customer_reviews.text: I see reviews for products like this that never mention the vehicle used, so I'll start off with that. I have a 2015 VW Tiguan and it works just fine. Not really sure if I put the bottom arms in the "right" place, but it seems to fit. I did have to tighten the straps to the max to make it not baggy, and it probably could be a little tighter. It looks like it'll do the trick, think it's a little overpriced even on a lightening deal, but I think this will help me particularly when I have a passenger and can't use that seat for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: So bummed it ripped and keeps ripping!!
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars for doing what I needed it to... keep our Boston Terrier in the back of the truck- BUT - 0 stars for durability!!!! We have used it for 6 days of traveling and it started to separate on day 1 :-( This is now day 6 and its ripped half way across the top. While we have used it for very small garbage we have not over stuffed it by any means. Had it not ripped so early and so severely I would have given it 4-5 stars.... I call this poor quality in construction.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of a purse, I carry a cinch sack. It is made of a slippery fabric and closes with just the cords. When I had a passenger in my car, I had to put my "purse" on the floor behind me. It was hard to reach, and so many times I grabbed my bag only to have it empty the contents all over because it was upside down. Now I just stow my bag in my AMEIQ 3-Layer Car Mesh Organizer, which attaches securely between my car's seats. My bag is so easy to reach and stays upright. I am thrilled with this invaluable problem solver and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen99208

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for holding my masks, gloves and wipes
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this in early March, I thought this would provide a useful way to hold my small purse and other small items that float around on my front seat. It turns out that this has been a GREAT place to hold clean masks, disposable gloves and wipes that I use when I go to the grocery store or on other errands. They're easily accessible, clean and sorted. I keep the masks in the small section and the gloves and wipes container in the big section. This was easy to install and isn't obtrusive. One of my best purchases this year.
customer_reviews.author: CAWoman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly small and oddly made.
customer_reviews.text: I got a new car and wanted to train my BIG dog to stay in the back seat in hopes of keeping the front seat in good condition.. This item looked like a good start along with protective seat covers and waterproof mats. If your seat covers are installed over the headrest, which mine are, unfortunately, it leaves no place to clip the carabiners to. I'd have to modify things a bit which would mean putting holes in the seat covers. I'm not sending it back (too much hassle) but if I had it to do over, I wouldn't buy this .
customer_reviews.author: Avis J.

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only had it for 1 month & It’s unraveling on the top!
customer_reviews.text: Although a great concept the quality of the netting is very low. Mine is starting to unravel at the top of the netting causing a hole. I loved it until now. I’m super bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa C

customer_reviews.title: Small, ugly.
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller in person than it looks in the picture. They also kind of make it look like it has 3 pockets, but it's really just two, with a lower leveled front edge for some reason. This ended up looking a bit tacky in a car without dark seats.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Cazier

customer_reviews.title: Works well in an F-150
customer_reviews.text: We tried it in three different vehicles. In our F-350 I thought the fit was okay and it would work. The picture is from our F-150 and I thought the fit was perfect and we were really pleased with how it was with our three dogs. in our Ford fusion sedan we felt that it wasn't the best fit although it did work satisfactorily. Decided to leave it in the F-150 and maybe look into other options for other vehicles but may still purchase two more of these since it technically fits.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough or able to adjust for length.
customer_reviews.text: This product is made well but it didn’t work for me as it was not long enough to prevent my dog from ducking underneath it to stick his head between the seats. I was disappointed in this product that it did not allow you to adjust it to extend downward to prevent this from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S. Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sound
customer_reviews.text: For safety I’d put my purse on the floor behind my seat but have come close to wrenching my back. Now I can have it in my organizer and not worry someone could reach in an open window to take it, nor that it’ll slide and I’ll wreck my back trying to reach for it. My medium cross-body purse fits perfectly, but the mesh pockets might not hold any larger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C

customer_reviews.title: To small.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit between front seats. Make sure to check measurements before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: smay

customer_reviews.title: Had to order a second one for my mom's car.
customer_reviews.text: I got this during Prime Day & it is such a clever idea. I don't know how long the netting will hold up, but it is a great place to tuck my purse & other items while driving. It's also become the place where I put my sunglasses since the hinge no longer holds for me to hang them from my visor. My dog, though, won't let something like this get in the way of him & the front seat. I'm very pleased with this & my mom loved it when she saw it, so I've ordered another for her car.
customer_reviews.author: Adele S.

customer_reviews.title: Not made for a larger car
customer_reviews.text: Does not look like the picture when installed. Definitely made for a very small car.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerfulliest

customer_reviews.title: Mesh basket to hold things in your car
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace another one I had previously that was broken by a reckless passenger who put the seat back all the way down before I could unhook it.... so it snapped and broke. I like this one better anyway because it has two pockets, and it is sturdy. I got it to hold mini water bottles that I gave to my rideshare passengers for free. Everyone LOVES the basket! I highly recommend this item and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Nia S. Adero

customer_reviews.title: A touch bit wider ice have two in different cars
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this five stars because it works as designed we have it in our Chevy Camaro and it fits the space perfectly I added it to our Chevy Silverado and it’s not quite filling up the space with the mesh lining there is no problem with the elastic material that stretches from the mesh lining that connects to the headrest or that connects to the bottom of the seat that all is perfect I just wish the mesh A touch bit wider
customer_reviews.author: Oskee Wowwow

customer_reviews.title: For my front seat dogs ha!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I have two dogs who have no idea they are supposed to be "backseat dogs" and they try to crawl all over me while I am driving. This net keeps them in the back area of my SUV and also hold all of their walking goodies for when we go to the park. I am unable to use the doggy seat belt with them because they choke themselves trying to get in the front. This gives them ample space to move around without being a hazard to me while driving. PLUS all of their stuff is kept neatly in one place instead of being thrown all over the car. SCORE!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Net for my Jeep
customer_reviews.text: This net makes use of that weird spot in between the front seats, creating a little more storage and a "barrier" between the front and the back. It was super easy to install. When my dogs are in the back of the Jeep, this net keeps them from trying to crawl up front. I keep a small umbrella in one of the pockets. It also looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: RiverOdin

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: First we tried a barrier that used pressure against floor and celling to hold it in place. After a few weeks it would loosen up and we would have to reset it. This thing just hooks on to what ever is available and stays there. It didn't care where the seats were positioned. We installed it backwards of the picture. The dogs didn't need to have pouches to store things in, but we made great use of them for the front seat passengers.
customer_reviews.author: Lockinvar

customer_reviews.title: It would have been better if it was shipped flat
customer_reviews.text: Product tightening strap has a cheap ball that comes loose when you close the lid on the armrest. The product has a plastic pocket on the back When it was shipped to me it was folded in half so it is warped in the middle and does not present like the image o sit th way it is supposed to due to the bend in the pocket
customer_reviews.author: DjLara Woodworth

customer_reviews.title: impedes back seat access
customer_reviews.text: Being used to Costco fantastic return policy, the 30 days (no exceptions!) was pretty hard to take. I purchased this for a driving trip (so was gone just over 30 days). Frequently needed to reach into the back seat so the design of this did not work out for me. Though I reached out to the seller and to Amazon customer service as soon as I returned from trip, they would not let me return this:-(.
customer_reviews.author: D. belcore

customer_reviews.title: 3 layer is 2 pockets. 2 layer is 1 pocket.
customer_reviews.text: Dont get confused like me. 3 layer is 2 pockets. 2 layer is layer is 1 pocket. Product was easy enough to put on seems to hold items securely. I wish it had 3 pockets but I'll take what I can get. Tension has to be fairly tight to a secure handbag but it does work. Overall good product especially for th3 price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectation
customer_reviews.text: This is very solidly made. It also fit nicely and took maybe 30 seconds to install. I love that I can put my purse in it when I have a passenger. I am heading out on a road trip soon and looking forward to other ways I can use it for storage. I am very happy I bought this. Only drawback is how long the drawstrings are. They hang down in the back. But that is something small.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Haney

customer_reviews.title: Three layer means 2 pockets only!
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed. I felt it was misrepresented. I thought the three layer one had three usable pockets but only has two. Not very deep. It’s ok However I purchased it first and thought it was the wrong one so I returned it and purchased it again. I received the two pocket one again. Oh well it will do. The company was fast to send the “correct one” tho.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Romanelli

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for our needs
customer_reviews.text: As we were wanting to use this product to barricade the cargo area from the backseat in our Highlander (to keep our German Shepherd from wandering forward), the size was not the issue but the inability to hook the bottom straps to anything to keep it in place. WARNING to anyone considering purchasing this item: try it out right away to see if it's a "keeper" for you, as the return window is rather short (we were away unfortunately so didn't get a chance to follow up in time to do a return).
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pockets for extra storage!
customer_reviews.text: This mesh organizer earns all of five stars for ease of installation, sturdiness and extra pockets that I didn’t realize I needed. This is a must have for me to keep my purse in arms reach on the console without it sliding into the back. I liked the previous brand I used but it was much less sturdy, no pockets and had to be readjusted. THIS organizer is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Zack's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to install unfortunately does not work with a 2004 Honda CRV. All I have in between my two front seats is a foldable tray. This tray is not very long so there’s no where for your purse to be supported so it just falls to the floor and the net is too far back. But again, great quality though. I’m still looking for one that would work with my car. 😟
customer_reviews.author: ShabbyD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in size
customer_reviews.text: This was so tiny!! Bottom straps weren't long enough to connect to anything. Way too small for my honda element. My chihuahua hopped right over it while I was trying to figure out how to make it work and he's old and crippled. Useless for my purpose which was to keep dogs in back seat. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Rayna

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to hold a square kleenex box (with dispenser on top) and small round container of disinfecting wipes and this was perfect! It also creates a barrier so that I can place my purse on the middle hump and it won't fall down into the back seat. Seems good quality and was easy to install. Got one for each car and works perfectly in both.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my 75 lb dog in the back seat.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a steal gate by any means but it does help detract my big dog from jumping in the front seat. At first, she still tried and was successful. But with a little training and for the price, it works and I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daun M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Putting this between the seats didn't really work for me because we have the two seats adjusted so differently (one for a tall person, one for a short person) and it skews really funny when the seats are uneven. If they were the same it would likely work okay. I didn't really like it on the back of the seat, either, so I gave it away. Seemed to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to hook on the seats.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for, and the stretch cords made it easy to hook on the seats in different places which made it easy to fit my car. Great for keeping the dog from jumping into the front seat. That was my main reason for buying this, but I also love the ability to store a few things. It appears to be well made and sturdy enough to last. Actually it came earlier than they said as well. Will buy from this seller again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: kittkatt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2018 Subaru Cross-trek. I needed something like this to keep my purse from falling in the back seat when I have a passenger. This works perfectly! #1Bonus, it also keeps my dachshunds from jumping in the front seat! YAY! #2Bonus, it has pockets that can hold lots of things, I've used it to keep my phone secure when it's plugged into the car. Very well made, and installed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Saving Space
customer_reviews.text: You never realize how much you need something like this until you have it, before this, my passenger seat was always full of items - my girlfriend would huff and puff over having to move everything when she got in the car, now, this holds all those things (great for if you have multiple sunglasses but no sunglasses holder). Works well - it's easy! Nothing to it.
customer_reviews.author: CJF

customer_reviews.title: Mesh organizer comes in handy for extra storage that's easy to reach.
customer_reviews.text: This item was very easy to install and is sturdy. When set up between the front seats, I can place my handbag on divider between the front seats and this prevents my bag from falling backwards. I also use it to keep items like baby toys or a hat, on hand. It's capacity is a bit limited as it doesn't stretch very far but I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Holds up pretty good. I use it to hold my 32 oz metal thermos full of liquid. Itll sag a tiny bit but a 32oz full is pretty heavy. Anything that doesnt fit in the cup holders or side compartment goes there. Sometimes I keep it clean and it works as a good "compartment seperator" when I have all my rear seats down and carrying cargo.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L.

customer_reviews.title: 2012 Tahoe LT Z71
customer_reviews.text: It fits. I had to tie the draw string on the bottom so it’s not hanging. I didn’t tighten the draw string because of how wide I needed the bag to be. It keeps my 2 year old from climbing up front. I don’t have the back full or filled with heavy objects. It just has a small book and a few small toys. It does not cover or interfere with the rear climate controls or audio controls.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for any purse I’ve owned - and purse isn’t big!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. The product measures up to the purchase price.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. The quality is excellent and it was easy to install. I gave 4 stars as the net does not go far enough down in my 2018 Terrain. I say this as I have long haired dachshunds who will be able to slip underneath the net if they they wise up. Hope they don't. If this happens I hope I can add something to pull it down further. Both my husband and I think it is a great design.
customer_reviews.author: C.Joy S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this for my Jeep.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my Jeep between the front seats and it’s amazing!! It holds so many things, especially my ever present hand sanitizer and baby wipes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Car mesh organizer
customer_reviews.text: Did not connect correctly to car and stay connected and therefore could not hold any items. I really really wanted to like this item as it would have been great for my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy, easy to install, and well made. It just doesn’t fit my 2020 Outback. There is a larger gaping hole between the bottom of the net and the center console. I was hoping that my handbag could rest up against it on the console - unfortunately it falls right down to the floor in the back. Awkward.
customer_reviews.author: JB4U

customer_reviews.title: From messy to neat
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t need this mesh storage unit as a pet barrier but it is just what I needed for holding all those little extras that get in the way on my console tray. That area of my car had looked messy, but now it looks neat, and I have all my little extras like gum, hand lotion, tissues, and brush right nearby. Best of all, I can reliably use my mug holder for my mug.
customer_reviews.author: Patty K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & use
customer_reviews.text: I drive an older Tahoe & my Mr is always putting my purse in the backseat where I can't reach it, now it rests right in between the seats safely. Same with when I'm driving, I no longer have to tick my purse in the backseat when I have a passenger. It was very easy to install, easy to adjust. More than 1 pocket is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Overall does the job but not as sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is not as snug and sturdy as you would be led to believe. I put my bulky wallet, my two cell phones, and other items such as a water bottle in these pockets to keep these items close by but not in valuable real estate in the car. Items stay put but you can't really stuff it with that many things otherwise it would break.
customer_reviews.author: Rumit P

customer_reviews.title: Make it double-sided & more adjustable for 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Really helps keep my car in order, during my rideshare driving. I sell snacks, and this is perfect for that. The quality is better than I expected, and I really like that it's reversible. I only wish it was double-sided so I can put wipes and things of that nature, facing my riders (the snacks are facing me). Make it double-sided and more adjustable (to sit a little higher off my arm rest) for 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MRSzInquistive Innovator

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Salem's has two pockets and fits perfectly inside my SUV between my front seats. it did not come with an instruction so I kind of had to figure it out but it's pretty simple to attach the bottom portion to the seats in the top to the headrests. I was a little hesitant on how it would work inside my new vehicle but it was exactly what I needed for front storage and rear storage for the passengers.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm to keep mine from stomping all over the center console and in the back. I have one who always tries to sit in the front seat and both of them like to stand on the center console, which is a whole other set of issues. This works well and stays in place. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LabrynthTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our new pup!
customer_reviews.text: For us, this worked best to put in place before you even get a dog. That way, they are not used to sneaking into the front seat to begin with. The pouch in it is great to store a container of hand wipes, sunglasses, water bottle etc. That was an appreciated plus for the product.
customer_reviews.author: KMA

customer_reviews.title: adjustment straps others dont have
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy with adjustment straps that will make it fit in different cars; I had another brand pet mesh barrier like this one, it was not so sturdy and never got the right fit, it was always too tight or to loosen; I didnt rate the storage capacity because I dont see it as a storage device and never used it as such
customer_reviews.author: eduardo slerca

customer_reviews.title: Most useful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for an impending trip thinking it would help keep some things easily accessible. It does! It is made well and the placement keeps it out of the way of the back and front seat. It's sturdy and looks like it will hold what I need without having to search over the seat or have it on the floor in the front. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Great . . . but won't last!
customer_reviews.text: At first, this did the job, stopped the kids from climbing into the front seats of the van. Extra storage was a bonus. But, one month in and the stitching is unraveling; the netting has already come undone at 4 different points. Not durable, choose a different manufacturer if you want it to last more than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Presnell

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile and need
customer_reviews.text: I took a Lyft ride last week and saw this mesh organizer in an SUV. Love it and it is very versatile. The driver used that to keep tiny water bottles for the passengers and tissue papers. Love the idea and decide to buy it for myself. It works well with my Toyota Camry. Have not put water bottle in there yet. But will put something in there. I have cup holder and not a Uber driver, so no need for passenger bottle water, but may be good for napkins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a 67.7oz hand sanitizer and a box of tissues
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be just what I needed! Time will tell how it holds up. But for now it’s great! The top pocket holds my 67.6oz hand sanitizer and a square box of tissues, leaving the bottom pocket tight and open for smaller items. But I’m glad to have it!
customer_reviews.author: dcb

customer_reviews.title: Good option, recommended. Has one minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a decent storage option. Helps to keep my vehicle organized while on patrol with an added seat organizer. The only flaw is the fastening material. I wish the elastic was a bit more stiff and of better quality. I suspect the elastic will dry out and degrade over time due to sunlight. Overall for the price, it’s good added storage.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J

customer_reviews.title: It connects very easy to the head rest and then the bottom of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my 4 door Jeep wrangler. Just wanted some extra pockets to store things. It connects very easy to the head rest and then the bottom of the seat Its adjustable so it can fit between any spaces... Easy to unclip (If you kid also likes to jump up front while we wait for her practice in the parking lot) It comes with two pockets. Seems relatively durable so far
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Lee

customer_reviews.title: Product does what it was designed to do..Hold Snack!
customer_reviews.text: The hooks that connect to the bottom of the seat don’t really connect to much and sometimes pop off. Other than that the product does what it was designed to do. I have two girls, toddler and baby and this holds all of the random item parents need with easy access while driving. Also used it for our Florida trip and it was perfect for the snacks and chargers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: Good size net. I think the one I received only has 2 pockets, but that may help keep from over stuffing it. There weren't instructions when I received this and I still haven't figured out how/where to hook the bottom strings... I'm hoping it is enough deterrence to keep my dog from trying to squeeze into the front of the car while driving while keeping air flow to the rear seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice additional storage
customer_reviews.text: The mesh organizer provided much needed additional storage space to my 2020 Corolla. The install was not very intuitive but I eventually figured it out. I hooked up the bottom by feeling around where to connect it. I need to check if it's a secure connection location. It's possible for this install to be connected to the wrong location, making it insecure.
customer_reviews.author: Eli P

customer_reviews.title: Good product. But watch out to get correct layer size
customer_reviews.text: Order a 3 layer, received a 2 layer. So I’m a bit disappointed. However, I still have it a good rating because though less layers, still a good product. Didn’t have time to exchange since it came just the day before my trip and I needed it
customer_reviews.author: Sabine P

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: It isn't tight enough to keep my purse from falling into the back seat looks like a good organizer so I'll have to see if I can figure out a way to keep it from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Adding space to your auto
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for traveling as we needed more space to hold those thigns we use during travel. It is very sturdy, made very well. Has three compartments to put things in. Glad I bought it. Not easy to install but not too difficult either. Holds quite a bit and can handle weighty thingsy as well.
customer_reviews.author: BECA G

customer_reviews.title: Functional if not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's functional but not terribly large so it doesn't really hold what I'd hoped it would but that's undoubtedly my fault for failing to adequately read the size description. The 4th generation Prius eliminated some front storage space (argh!!!!) and I was searching for a way to augment that loss. This is a poor substitute but having something is better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I am tired of shoving my purse under my feet when driving with a passenger in my car. It keeps my bag from falling into the back of the car, and holds hand sanitizer, wipes, tissues, even some activity books for the grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Helzer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to block my dog jumping to the front seats of Subaru outback. It works perfectly for me. Storage wise, not much. If you store heavy stuff on the pockets, it bends and kills the main purpose of using as a blocker.
customer_reviews.author: Milan M.

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these in my Lincoln but it didn't have this many pockets. It's really handy as there is limited space in my console in the new car.I keep my umbrella, wet wipes and water bottle in the bag and there 's plenty of room for other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews stated that this was much smaller than expected. It is as specified, about 12" square, the exact size of the area between the seats. It has kept our dog from coming up to the front seat while traveling, the exact purpose for the purchase. It also holds a box of crackers and other snack items. I'd give it 6 stars, but you only have a 5 star rating available. Probably won't hold a giant dump purse. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: carewood

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it'd be too small for my f150 but it fits perfectly. It took a bit to get the bottom rope part to lay right in the console door but I figured it out. And it actually holds my purse in place! Love it. I don't have anything in the pockets but I might put something flat like tissues or wipes in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions to hook up bottom straps.
customer_reviews.text: No instruction on how to hook up bottom straps to prevent items from falling through. I just let it hang from the top of the seats, I don't know how it attaches under the seats. The netting is a good thick quality.
customer_reviews.author: Olgalucía

customer_reviews.title: Works ... sort of
customer_reviews.text: Our Welsh Terriers look at this and then when in the mood, jump over it or go under it. Still though, it does tend to keep the sweet rascals in the back seat where they are safer and travel better. Pretty solid little barrier.
customer_reviews.author: Panamint

customer_reviews.title: This product does what it’s intended to do
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have a major jumper, this will keep your four-legged contained in the rear seat. It was easy to Install in our Ford Flex and the pockets are great for holding our non profit brochures, business cards and collapsible water bowl. Dogs, kids or not, this would be ideal for the traveling business person. It takes a little more effort to retrieve an item from behind the seats but keeping everyone safe while driving is top priority. I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MBF

customer_reviews.title: Dog Safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. The attachment hardware is well designed and easy to use. It was put to use immediately with the items that had been scattered in the car. The real plus was the safety for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJohn C

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for extra car storage
customer_reviews.text: Cars never seem to have enough storage for things like kleenex, hand wipes, etc. This mesh bag is perfect. It fits between the front seats and with the two pockets, it stored what we needed for a recent vacation. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda G

customer_reviews.title: Will this work on your vehicle?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my pickup, it’s a 2011 Dodge Ram. With the top straps fully extended I struggled to attach the pouch, the seams started to break. It is not a good fit for my vehicle. I would hate to know what happens when the seats are moved
customer_reviews.author: M. Soffiantini

customer_reviews.title: Kept my dog in the back seat
customer_reviews.text: We did a nearly 8000 mile road trip this last summer in my Kia Soul. My dog was with us in the back seat. The mesh divider was great for keeping our maps handy and our cell phones out of the way, but it kept my dog from jumping into the front seat. He CAN jump over it, but I think he knew he was not supposed to. Great investment and good price
customer_reviews.author: Becky Olson

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I knew what the dimensions were before purchasing, but I guess I let the photos deceive me. I was expecting to be able to keep my purse secured in this but the most I can fit is a skinny box of tissues and some paperwork. There is no depth to this at all. Continuing to look for a good solution to secure my purse in this space between the seats.
customer_reviews.author: Franka Maerz

customer_reviews.title: Fish Net storage holder for car.
customer_reviews.text: Comes in handy putting things in there that don't fit in my organizer next to my chair. It's easy to get to stored items. It's pretty sturdy, it held my water bottle that was filled with ice & water.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Prout

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough if you have a small pup who can channel her inner cat
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a little while until my pup tried to climb over it and succeeded, since then she's made short work of it and climbs over with no trouble. If anything it provided some entertainment for my family and I watching her channel her inner cat and getting a nice workout from it.
customer_reviews.author: Celsius Fahrenheit

customer_reviews.title: Seat back net bag
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the net bag and installing it in my truck I have found multiple uses for it. It is one of the best features I have in my truck. I recommend this item as it has a multitude of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Georich

product_meta.title: AMEIQ 3-Layer Car Mesh Organizer, Seat Back Net Bag, Barrier of Backseat Pet Kids, Cargo Tissue Purse Holder, Driver Storage Netting Pouch. (3 Optional Styles)
feature_bullets: ◆ This Mesh Bag has Four Metal Hooks --- The upper 2 are aluminum alloy, and the below 2 are nickel plated steel.

◆ The Size of This Pet Barrier is Large Enough --- Height: 12.0 in, Width: 11.6 in (generally only 10.2 in or less), it can completely cover the gap between the front two seats, and put more things in.
◆ Mesh Material of This Car Organizer is Super Strong --- High quality nylon, inelastic. The net bed made of it can lay 6 adults.
◆ Installation of This Handbag Holder is Very Simple --- On top, just buckle on the headrest column; on bottom, hook on the hard edge of any object under the seat.

◆ The above Two Straps are Adjustable in Length and The Nylon Material have not Elasticity --- It can be suitable for different models of cars, and prevents the whole sag due to too heavy things in the mesh bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,578 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
